name: Dr. DNA
description:
Very little gameplay! But you can dig for the Dino DNA encased in amber! Was created for the Idle Thumbs Community Wizard Jam.

FPS Controls:

WASD + mouse Look. Press 'E' to use Computer.

Controls While using computer:

WASD to move your camera while using computer.

2D Game Controls:

Mouse + Left Mouse Button to walk and dig.

Click on shovel or pickaxe to dig.

Credits:

Art & Programming: Joachim "CEJ" Lindkvist

Music: Chee Zee Jungle by Kevin MacLeod

Extra Download Links:

Because there were some problems with the Itch.io download the other day I will leave a couple of extra links here for now.
